directions: Bring the chicken broth to a boil in a saucepan over high heat. Add quinoa, reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and simmer until the quinoa is tender and the liquid has been absorbed, about 13 minutes. Stir in olive oil; fluff quinoa  with a fork. Set aside to cool slightly.
Stir mint, almonds, dried cranberries, kale, carrots, celery, scallion, grape tomatoes, lemon juice, and lemon zest.  Season to taste with salt and ground black pepper.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
title: Quinoa Salad with Mint, Almonds and Cranberries
